text:
This MRT station boasts an impressive network of underground walkways, providing convenient access throughout the River Valley area, including Great World City.

The station's modern design and feel, extending from the control rooms to the exits and bus stops, are particularly noteworthy.

New MRT station. Located in Great World City.

Got a few gates ‚Äî 6 gates. Some of them still under construction, some open already la. Then how to go in and go out.

Normal MRT station. Got nothing special but the interior is ok la

This is one of my favorite stations to go to because I really loved the design they made for the interior of the MRT station! Quite convenient to go to Great World City and a nearby school from here. Unfortunately, some exits that are easily assessable to Great World City is still under renovation! I am fine with that‚Ä¶ Also this places is near Orchard but ironically it is far from Orchard. Before this station was opened, we have to get here by bus by far the best. I feel good that they opened this MRT station!!ü§™üòÅ Quite nearby some condominiums found in the vicinity!üòÉ

Train stations is quite nice and the design is attractive. There is a Cheers and an ijooz station where they serve orange juice. An exit to Great World has since opened for a while, but they are currently building an exit to a overhead bridge that enters great world shopping mall.
It is nearly complete at the time of posting. Could have opened an exit closer to the nearby River Valley Primary School. Otherwise very good. Also after school (1.30pm) please expect Cheers to be crowded with schoolchildren.
Finally the Exit to Great World City mall has opened even though the underpass was quite a distance
